html:
5.15.17  3:55 pm   At the beginning of HoTEWiG, you mentioned buying a boat, but actually displayed a plane. Was this dislocation of imagery intentional?

     yes
5.15.17  3:42 pm   Come to Brazil, you can stay in my house in the capital of Rio Grande do Sul and we can hang out

5.15.17  3:34 pm   hOw too functoiN?1!?

     i'm not sure, you kind of have to make up your own way

5.15.17  3:28 pm   i would buy a shirt. can you make a shirt?

     i would like to focus on other types of content

5.15.17  3:05 pm   i'm ready for people to stop asking you about using capital letters.

     that's not going to happen but i will keep using them anyway, in ways that i feel are appropriate
5.15.17  2:54 pm   What is your favorite favorite?

5.15.17  2:48 pm   Why are you weird?

     i'm just trying to be reasonable
5.15.17  2:36 pm   how long did it take to make the history of the world

5.15.17  2:34 pm   Why did you choose 'global warming' and 'plastic in the ocean' as your environmental problems to reference?

     i don't remember but i guess it seemed reasonable at the time

5.15.17  2:29 pm   How, if at all, did you balance researching and creating HOTEWIG or HOJ, answering all of these questions, and having a social life?

     i don't have a social life, and i alternated between the other 2 things you mentioned

5.15.17  2:23 pm   Have you ever actually gone to Starbucks to play a ukelele? If not, would you and what would you play?

     that line is from the new canaan song, which is a true story. i did work on the song outside that starbucks but i actually did not buy the ukulele until 3 days later. it was used on the next songwriting trip (princeton)

5.15.17  2:21 pm   how did you decide the parts of the score that you wanted to be similar between hotewig and hoj? for instance the synth at 4:30 when farming was invented is like the same exact melody as the flute from 0:29 "crazy rice farms". also the "sunrise land" jingle at 9:21. i'm sure there must be others

     besides the sunrise bit, nothing was deliberately repeated. but since every moment is custom scored, there are naturally going to be certain simple melodic patterns that show up multiple times. there's only so many choices. for example the 345 melody (ex. efg) surely occurs all over the place. also i should mention i have almost no memory of history of japan because i haven't seen it since feb 2, 2016

5.15.17  2:16 pm   How can I bring you as much happiness as you brought me?

     i don't know but it's not a contest

5.15.17  2:09 pm   Do you have autism?

     i've never been tested

5.15.17  2:07 pm   wanna hear a joke

     sure

5.15.17  1:55 pm   Do you think chips on sandwiches are acceptable?

     you will have to check with the Committee of Sandwich Acceptance

5.15.17  1:44 pm   if i'm 8 and my sister is half my age how old will my sister be when im 80?

     probably about 76

5.15.17  1:28 pm   does your income come from youtube?

     no
5.15.17  1:25 pm   Why haven't you posted "i'm crazy/ it's raining" on Spotify yet?

5.15.17  1:04 pm   When is it okay to harmonize?

     it's always ok. unless you don't like it

5.15.17  12:59 pm   Did you know you misuse commas pretty often? I only want to make sure you know.

     the rules of commas are not set in stone. i try to use them to help express what i am trying to say in the best way possible

5.15.17  12:54 pm   whats the fastest way to learn magic?

     just start trying stuff, and see if it's magic

5.15.17  12:42 pm   do unicorns exists?

     i'm not sure

5.15.17  12:37 pm   Alright, someone's updated you about iPhones, and now for Mobile Chrome. Chrome can be on iOS too, but it is also a popular option on Android. There are three dots at the top right of the application. Click those, you get a menu! One the options is "find in page". Now you have a search box just like Ctrl/Cmd F!

     ah, brilliant. thank you
5.15.17  12:33 pm   So are you a youtuber now???

5.15.17  12:32 pm   Seeing the projects you manage to finish and seeing that you do not even try to make money from them

     that's not true, i do try to make money from them, in ways that i find reasonable

      makes me feel bad about myself. What can I do to feel less bad?

5.15.17  12:30 pm   what is your favorite movie of this year please answer

     i have spent the entire year making my own instead

5.15.17  12:27 pm   how do you properly drink seltzer

     you have to just start trying different ways until you find a way that works for you

5.15.17  12:16 pm   Seems like some people don't like it that you left some stuff out in your hotewig video.What is your response to them?

     the reason i didn't mention everything in that video is because the video was not long enough to mention everything

5.15.17  12:15 pm   now that you finished the hotewig will you make another long video or another short video if it is along vido=epo whats it called

     how about something of a more medium size
5.15.17  12:11 pm   Could you link this question to yes.mp3?
5.15.17  12:02 pm   why do you not like advertisements? you seem to have a very strong hatred towards them.

5.15.17  11:02 am   how do people invent colors?

     they can't. all the colors were already there
5.15.17  11:02 am   What did you do with your Shorty Award for Best in Weird? Also, I loved your acceptance speech.

5.15.17  11:01 am   are you currently working on any project, song or not

     oh hell yeah

5.15.17  10:51 am   why are we never satisfied?

     because maybe we can do better

5.15.17  10:45 am   On your prefered video platform that is Youtube.com where you upload your masterpieces.

     that is not necessarily my preferred video platform

      It bugs me why are you not having your short or lenghty video/clip/music video/ ect. moneytized or eligible to earn money from?

     the only way to do that is to rent your audience out to advertisers, which i am not interested in doing

5.15.17  10:43 am   Great world history video, but are you aware it misrepresents the Israeli-Palestinian conflict given that Israel accepted the UN partition to divide and share the land while the Palestinians did not? Saying they both got angrier in response implies they both rejected it, which is false.

     i don't think it implies that. i think it implies that they both became angry at each other. which i think is roughly true. i tried to represent this in orienting them both aiming their weapons at each other, not at the UN
5.15.17  10:29 am   Would you do Reddit AMA?

5.15.17  10:23 am   is a chord to a note, what a molecule is to an element?

     sure

5.15.17  10:21 am   shoplifting isn't stealing if you pay for it

     then it also isn't shoplifting

5.15.17  10:04 am   Why don't you commit suicide?

     that seems counter productive

5.15.17  10:02 am   did you intentionally spell laser with a z?

     yes
5.15.17  10:00 am   How are you so funny

5.15.17  9:55 am   have you ever studied music?

     i've been studying it all my life

      also who are your favorite musicians?

     i like the unique qualities of each one

5.15.17  9:36 am   does the "you" in many of your song lyrics refer to you (bill wurtz)?

     no

5.15.17  9:32 am   Red vs. Blue, who wins?

     i guess we won't know until the battle is over
5.15.17  9:30 am   How can I find the password of reality ?

5.15.17  9:25 am   why does the text in "homework help" have inner stroke and not outer stroke

     i don't know what that means

5.15.17  9:08 am   Pls update the reality page

     i will do it as soon as i can
